snippet: A branch of an Australian coffee roaster and retailer, Toby's Estate, will open on Monday in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.
abstract: A branch of an Australian coffee roaster and retailer, Toby's Estate, will open on Monday in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: In the last few years, the coffee scene in New York City has been something of a land rush, with some notable out-of-town companies setting up shop and teaching us a thing or two about how to roast, brew and correctly steam milk for a cappuccino. Some of them opened coffee shops (La Colombe Torrefaction, of Philadelphia; Gimme! Coffee, of Ithaca, N.Y.). Some opened training labs (Counter Culture Coffee, of Durham, N.C.; Intelligentsia Coffee and Tea, of Chicago), and some opened roasting facilities and coffee bars (Blue Bottle Coffee, of San Francisco and Oakland, Calif.; Stumptown Coffee Roasters, of Portland, Ore.).

headline.main: Toby's Estate Bringing More Coffee to Williamsburg
